original_title: ヨルシカ LIVE 月光
overview: "Yorushika LIVE TOUR 2022 Gekko" held in March 2022. The concept of "Gekko" is based on the two albums released in 2019, "Dakara Boku wa Ongaku wo Yameta" and "Eruma," and expresses the running light that the main character "Amy" saw on her deathbed.
title: Yorushika Live "Gekko"
